speaker: Skyreach Monastery
line: Stone steps climb into cloud. Prayer-bells hang silent, rimed so thick they look carved from frost.

speaker: Old Inscription
line: ‘Discipline is warmth.’ The letters are worn smooth where desperate hands once traced them.

speaker: Your Journal
line: The monastery offers shelter—if not comfort.

choices.text: Set a checkpoint at the monastery steps.

speaker: Skyreach Monastery
line: The wind does not enter the prayer-hall. It waits outside, listening.
